data.chText: （某些体育比赛的）裁判，裁判员
data.enText: the official who controls the game in some sports

data.chText: 他因为和裁判发生争执而被罚出场。
data.enText: He was sent off for arguing with the referee.
a person who gives information about your character and ability, usually in a letter, for example when you are applying for a job
a person who is asked to settle a disagreement

data.chText: 充当相关各方的调解人
data.enText: to act as a referee between the parties involved

data.chText: （专业性强的文章的）审阅人，鉴定专家
data.enText: a person who reads and checks the quality of a technical article before it is published
to act as the referee in a game

data.chText: 审阅，鉴定（专业性强的文章）
data.enText: to read and check the quality of a technical article before it is published

simple_means.memory_skill: refer 提到；指点 + ee 表人 →〔双方〕都提到的人 → 裁判

ex.enText: The judges awarded the prize to her.

ex.chText: 他是朗诵比赛的评委之一。
ex.enText: He is one of the judges at the recitation contest.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指比赛、竞赛中有权力对其结果作出裁定的裁判。

ex.chText: 仲裁人将拥有最终决定权。
ex.enText: The arbiter will have the final say.
Who is the arbiter of the will?

synonyms.bx: 指裁决对立两方争议事务的人。

ex.chText: 裁判员判罚了一个任意球。
ex.enText: The referee awarded a free kick.

ex.chText: 裁判员吹哨，结束了比赛。
ex.enText: The referee blew his whistle to end the match.

synonyms.bx: 通常指篮球、足球、拳击等比赛的裁判。

ex.chText: 那位网球裁判戴着硬壳遮阳帽。
ex.enText: The tennis umpire wore a sun helmet.

ex.chText: 裁判员宣布我们在比赛中获胜。
ex.enText: The umpire announced that we won the game.

synonyms.bx: 通常指网球、棒球、板球等比赛的裁判。

tr: (sports) the chief official (as in boxing or American football) who is expected to ensure fair play
an attorney appointed by a court to investigate and report on a case
someone who reads manuscripts and judges their suitability for publication
be a referee or umpire in a sports competition

value.def: The referee is the official who controls a sports event such as a football game or a boxing match.
When someone referees a sports event or contest, they act as referee.

example.ex: The match will be refereed by Derek Bevan from Wales...
example.tran: 这场比赛将由来自威尔士的德里克·贝文执法。

example.ex: Vautrot has refereed in two World Cups.
example.tran: 沃特罗特执法过两届世界杯。

value.def: A referee is a person who gives you a reference, for example when you are applying for a job.
value.tran: （求职等时的）推荐人，介绍人，证明人

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用 reference

trans: 边线裁判员;巡边员;司线员

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to bring, to carry 带来, 拿来
rootsaffixes.title: fer

partsOfSpeech.dec: con 共同 + fer 带来，拿来 → 共同拿出〔观点〕→ 协商
con 共同 + fer 带来，拿来 + ence 表行为 → 商量；会议
con 加强 + fer 带来，拿来 + ment 行为 → 带给 → 给予
de 向下 + fer 带来，拿来 → 往后带 → 延期
dif 分开 + fer 带来，拿来 → 分开带 → 不同
fer 带来，拿来 + ry 表场地 → 带人〔过河〕的地方 → 渡口
fert〔= fer〕带来，拿来 + ile 物体 → 能带来〔粮食的土地〕→ 肥沃的
in 进入 + fer 带来，拿来 → 带进〔意义〕→ 推理
in 进入 + fer 带来，拿来 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 + ial …的 → 推理的
odori 气味 + fer 带来，拿来 + ous …的 → 有气味的
of 加强 + fer 带来，拿来 → 提供，提出
pre 预先 + fer 带来，拿来 → 更喜欢
pro 向前 + ffer〔= fer〕带来，拿来 → 提供
re 一再 + fer 带来，拿来 → 提到；指点
refer 提到；指点 + ee 表人 →〔双方〕都提到的人 → 裁判
refer 提到；指点 + ence 性质，状态，行为 → 参考；引证
suf 下 + fer 带来，拿来 → 带到下面〔地狱〕→ 受苦
trans 转移 + fer 带来，拿来 → 转送；转移
